list.name: Changes
list.comment: Changed it to use Godot instead of Pygame, currently in the process of finishing out the python so that the game is actually playable, and the ai can play against itself.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Python.Enviornment and AI setup.executor": "Run", "Python.Enviornment.executor": "Run", "Python.Play And Visualize.executor": "Run", "Python.Training Qtables.executor": "Run", "Python.config.executor": "Run", "Python.dqn_model.executor": "Run", "Python.enviornment.executor": "Run", "Python.game_manager.executor": "Run", "Python.main_menu.executor": "Run", "Python.menu.executor": "Run", "Python.play_game.executor": "Run", "Python.pygame_gui.executor": "Run", "Python.risk_server.executor": "Run", "Python.test.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "Updating-massively", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "preferences.lookFeel" } }

task.summary: Established foundational stuff, building up Territory class as just a structure thats used to create the games themselves with no initialization. It can be copied and used for risk games in general, and contains a link to an image for each territory object by name. The board method current just generates the board but will soon have some tools useful for gameplay. Arrow isnt finished, and risk game ui only has the basics, but utilizes a recolor class to dynamically make the game elements rather than having them prefabricated.

Established foundational stuff, building up Territory class as just a structure thats used to create the games themselves with no initialization. It can be copied and used for risk games in general, and contains a link to an image for each territory object by name. The board method current just generates the board but will soon have some tools useful for gameplay. Arrow isnt finished, and risk game ui only has the basics, but utilizes a recolor class to dynamically make the game elements rather than having them prefabricated.
Updated Everything to be alot cleaner
Re added the save button, renamed SlickMenu to Main Menu and changed the window icon
Implemented some part of gameplay for the deploy phase and reorganized alot of stuff.

Changed from multipe AI to focusing on DQN, implemented the DQN, restructured the playing of the game so it provided a structure for imitation learning, and reogranized the file giving it proper python naming structures

MESSAGE.value: Established foundational stuff, building up Territory class as just a structure thats used to create the games themselves with no initialization. It can be copied and used for risk games in general, and contains a link to an image for each territory object by name. The board method current just generates the board but will soon have some tools useful for gameplay. Arrow isnt finished, and risk game ui only has the basics, but utilizes a recolor class to dynamically make the game elements rather than having them prefabricated.
Updated Everything to be alot cleaner
Re added the save button, renamed SlickMenu to Main Menu and changed the window icon
Implemented some part of gameplay for the deploy phase and reorganized alot of stuff.

Changed from multipe AI to focusing on DQN, implemented the DQN, restructured the playing of the game so it provided a structure for imitation learning, and reogranized the file giving it proper python naming structures
Changed it to use Godot instead of Pygame, currently in the process of finishing out the python so that the game is actually playable, and the ai can play against itself.
